references.paper_title: Scaling laws for neural language models
references.reason: This paper established foundational scaling laws for neural language models, which heavily influenced the study of scaling in other domains, including molecular GNNs in this paper.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This foundational paper introduced Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), a key architecture in the field of graph neural networks, forming the basis for many of the models explored in the current work.

references.paper_title: Neural message passing for quantum chemistry
references.reason: This paper introduced the Neural Message Passing (NMP) framework, a fundamental GNN architecture widely used for molecular property prediction and directly relevant to this study.
This paper introduced Graph Attention Networks (GATs), another important GNN architecture, which is explored and compared to other models in the present work.

references.paper_title: Therapeutics data commons: Machine learning datasets and tasks for drug discovery and development
references.reason: This paper introduced the Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC), a large and valuable dataset for drug discovery, which serves as a key data source for the current research.
